member.name: M:Sentry.Common.SystemClock.Now
member.summary: Gets a DateTime object that is set to the current date and time on this computer, expressed as the local time
member.remarks: The provider for determining current date and time is ThreadStatic. The default provider is System.DateTime.Now. When the provider is mocked from the Relative or Frozen methods, the current date and time will not represent the actual system clock time on the computer.
